mapper.select: SELECT gugun_code, gugun_name FROM GUGUNCODE where SUBSTR(gugun_code,0,1) = #{sido} ORDER BY gugun_code
SELECT distinct dong, dongcode from baseaddress where SUBSTR(dongcode,0,3) = #{gugun}
SELECT no,dong,AptName,code,jibun FROM houseinfo WHERE dong = #{dong} ORDER BY AptName
SELECT d.no, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.dtype, d.rentMoney, i.dong, i.aptName, i.jibun, i.lat, i.lng, i.img FROM housedeal d, houseinfo i WHERE d.no = i.no

SELECT d.no, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.dtype, d.rentMoney, i.dong, i.aptName, i.jibun, i.lat, i.lng, i.img FROM housedeal d, houseinfo i WHERE d.no=i.no and d.no = #{no}

SELECT d.no, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.dtype, d.rentMoney, i.dong, i.aptName, i.jibun, i.lat, i.lng, i.img FROM housedeal d, houseinfo i WHERE d.no=i.no AND i.aptName like '%' || #{aptName} || '%'

SELECT d.no, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.dtype, d.rentMoney, i.dong, i.aptName, i.jibun, i.lat, i.lng, i.img FROM housedeal d, houseinfo i WHERE d.no=i.no AND i.dong LIKE #{dong}
